What is a general contractor?

A general contractor — also known as a renovation contractor, remodeling contractor, or simply “GC” — is the main construction professional overseeing all aspects of a major remodeling project in NYC. From planning and permitting, to demolition, and through construction, your New York City contractor will work directly with you, their team of subcontractors, and all other construction professionals required for your project, which might include architects, designers, expediters, or engineers. 

Your Sweeten GC will also work with your condo or co-op board to get necessary approvals for your remodeling project, which can be a common stumbling block in the early stages of a renovation. They will usher your remodeling project from concept to completion to deliver a quality result that is on time and on budget. Learn more about the process and costs of remodeling with a general contractor in NYC:

  • Kitchen Remodeling Costs in NYC
  • Bathroom Remodeling Costs in NYC
  • How to Plan Your Renovation and Find the Best Contractor

Typical projects for this area include kitchen remodels, bathroom remodels, and entire home remodels. No matter the scope of your renovation project, you’ll want to find the best general contractor who is licensed and insured in NYC. They should also have relevant experience with remodeling projects like yours in your neighborhood or borough. The first step to hiring your GC is to connect with a few local professionals for site visits and get an estimate from each one. Sweeten can put you in touch with top general contractors for your NYC remodeling project, when you post your renovation project with us.

How does Sweeten connect me with the top general contractors for my New York City remodeling project?

Now that you know what a general contractor is, you might wonder how to hire the right contracting firm. General contractors may not be hard to find, but what can be a challenge is zeroing in on the general contractors who are experienced with projects like yours in NYC — your renovation scope, budget, building type, and location — and whose communication style and sense of professionalism mesh well with you. That’s where Sweeten’s free general contractor matching service comes in. We conduct thorough general contractor vetting to ensure we’re only working with the best local professionals in the industry. So, when you post your remodeling project on Sweeten, you’ll be connected to a competitive selection which:

  • are licensed, insured, and vetted
  • have experience with renovations like yours
  • do work in your city, town, or neighborhood
  • are already interested in your project based on its budget and scope
  • guarantee their work

Read more about how Sweeten works.

Are you an experienced general contractor in New York?

If you are, apply to be part of Sweeten’s general contractor network.
